attributes.action: allow all troops serving in conflict zones overseas tax exemption without six month limit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Troops in iraq for instance are being sent back to uk just before the six month limit when they would have had their pay gross of tax.  They are then sent back after a few weeks break to a conflict zone.  This ploy is simply to extract the tax from them.  This treacherous government shakes the hands of fighting soldiers and makes political capital from the public announcement that they would be exempt paying tax on their wages, only to take their money from their pocket with the other hand.
